projects.title: Crop & Fertilizer Recommendation System
projects.description: A machine learning-based system that recommends optimal crops and fertilizers based on soil conditions, weather patterns, and geographical data for maximizing agricultural yield.

projects.title: Weather Prediction System
projects.description: An advanced weather forecasting system using machine learning to predict temperature, humidity, and precipitation patterns with high accuracy.

projects.title: Dynamic Portfolio Website
projects.description: A modern, responsive portfolio website showcasing projects and skills. Features smooth animations, dynamic content loading, and interactive 3D elements.

projects.title: Task Management System
projects.description: A collaborative task management application with real-time updates, team collaboration features, progress tracking, and automated notifications.
